Posts.Content: New member writing. Just received the news from my urologist that my MRI results showed 2 lesions with PI-RADS = 4. A third lesion scored 5 on PI-RADS scale. Next step is targeted biopsy. Have read about Targeted Prostate Biopsy using MR-Ultrasound Fusion. Anyone had a biopsy using MR-Ultrasound fusion? How did it go?
Posts.Title: Targeted Prostate Biopsy using MR-Ultrasound Fusion
